title: Found on Vitra website.
content:
Hey,

I like this typeface that I found on the Vitra website. Anyone what know what it is? If you can suggest similar style fonts I would be interested in those too!

Thanks in advance.

x

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [indent\_type\_please.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184500/http:/typophile.com/files/indent_type_please.gif) | 3.25 KB |
author: Polypixel

comments.content:
I think it's a Bodoni Black italic, similar to [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184500/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/bodoni-m/) from URW.

- Mike Yanega

Hi Mike.

Yeah that's close. The "u" is slightly different.
